CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL (Relationship_Status__c, "green"), IMAGE("/resource/a3PLgreen", "green", 25, 25),"")+ IF(ISPICKVAL (Relationship_Status__c, "yellow"), IMAGE("/resource/a3PLyellow", "yellow", 25, 25),"")+ IF(ISPICKVAL (Relationship_Status__c, "red"), IMAGE("/resource/a3PLRed", "red", 25, 25),"")
CustomField.label: Customer Is
